column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////First time in Chicago
column3: tried out their veggie deep dish
column4: they had a solid 1.5 hour wait on Friday night
column5: and took another 20-30 mins to get the pizza  -- and it was delicious! Juice
column7: flavorful deep dish. The cheese and sauce both tasted very good. I ordered small but it was more than enough for 2-3 meals because their pizza is dense and heavy -- great value for money in my opinion.  Will definitely go back next time I'm in Chicago!
